text: Vladimir Georgiyevich Repyev (; July 11, 1956 - January 4, 2009) was a Soviet/Russian handball player who competed in the 1980 Summer Olympics.Vladimir Repyev's obituary retrieved 31 January 2011 In 1980 he won the silver medal with the Soviet team. He played one match. ==References== *Profile Category:1956 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Soviet male handball players Category:Russian male handball players Category:Handball players at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic handball players of the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic medalists in handball Category:Medalists at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Burials in Troyekurovskoye Cemetery
title: Vladimir Repyev
